saivishnu.intro:
I am a 20 year old kid who is still figuring out life.
I spend most of my days around tech (because it is my comfort space).
I also enjoy driving and roaming to random places .
I've recently taken a deep interest in Formula 1 (Max ftw!)
interests: staring at the ceiling, while listening to Taylor Swift

unconcerned.intro:
I am a 20 year old BCA student tinkering around tech to find where my heart lies.
I am currently learning web development but I've realised that this isn't my cup of tea.
I feel like my heart lies in low level programming.
I love Linus Torvalds's contribution to the world!
